actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that certain employers contracting with the Federal Government may compute wages on the basis of a 4-day workweek consisting of 10-hour workdays.

summary.text: Permits employers contracting with the Federal Government, under the provisions of the Work Hours Act of 1962, to compute wages on the basis of a four-day workweek consisting of ten-hour workdays. (Amends 40 U.S.C. 328 (a))

titles.title: A bill to provide that certain employers contracting with the Federal Government may compute wages on the basis of a 4-day workweek consisting of 10-hour workdays.
